VACANCY: MILLWRIGHT

Ref: CXP102/2024

To undertake and be responsible for the electrical / mechanical maintenance on company sites.
Salary: Market related– dependent on experience and quals
Fixed term contract with potential for permanency
Location: Durban Bayhead

Criteria:
Certified Trade Test as Millwright
Hold a wireman’s license / electrical trade test
At least 5 years proven experience as a Millwright artisan in large industries. (Petro Chemical, paper, pulp or large manufacturing).
Medically fit to work on industrial sites.
Prepared to work shifts, standby, callouts, and overtime
Ability to work at heights and in confined spaces.
Computer literate
